price: Ɔsoro ne asaase so ahennie nyinaa wͻ Nyankopͻn. Onyankopͻn na ͻwͻ biribiara so tumi.
arabic: وَلِلَّهِ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٌ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: walillahi mul'ku al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wal-lahu ʿalā kulli shayin qadīrun
